ComicInfo.Series: My Little Pony: Classics Reimagined - The Unicorn of Odd
ComicInfo.Summary: A farmer, a scarecrow, a tin woodsmare, and a lion walk into the woods... and decide to follow the Yellow Brick Road to Odd! Dorothy and her new friends are continuing their journey to meet the Wizard of Odd, in hopes that he can give them their hearts' desires-or in Tin Woodsmare's case, an actual heart. Hopefully they don't run into any fields of poppies or flying monkeys along the way!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 21:50:18. [CVDB1028887] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:09:48. [Issue ID 2578021]
ComicInfo.Characters: Rainbow Dash,Applejack,Spitfire,Queen Chrysalis,Pinkie Pie,Winona,Opalescence,Soarin,Queen of the Field Mice,Fluttershy,Rarity,Owlowiscious
ComicInfo.Title: The Unicorn of Odd [Part 3]
